Maven Repository

WQuery Maven repository is located at http://wquery.org/repo

You may copy paste the following repository definition into your pom.xml

<repository>
    <id>wquery-repository</id>
    <name>WQuery Repository</name>
    <url>http://wquery.org/repo</url>
</repository>

WQuery package has the following coordinates

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.wquery</groupId>
    <artifactId>wquery</artifactId>
    <version>0.5.0</version>
</dependency>
